title: Waymo One Autonomous Service
summary_short: Fully autonomous electric taxi service operating 24/7 with zero-emission vehicles.
intro_short: Waymo's autonomous ride-hailing service uses all-electric Jaguar I-PACE vehicles powered by Waymo Driver AI. Operating in Phoenix, San Francisco, and Los Angeles, it provides emission-free transportation with level 4 autonomy.
impact: By 2030, Waymo could displace 500,000 personal vehicles, reducing urban CO2 emissions by 1.2 million tons annually while improving accessibility for elderly and disabled passengers.

title: Tesla Robotaxi Network
summary_short: Tesla's vision for fully autonomous electric taxis with no human drivers.
intro_short: Tesla's upcoming robotaxi service will utilize purpose-built vehicles with 360Â° cameras and Tesla Vision. Designed for continuous operation, vehicles will automatically return to Tesla charging hubs between rides.
impact: Projected to reduce urban transportation costs by 75% compared to Uber while eliminating 4.5 tons of CO2 emissions per vehicle annually. Deployment expected in 2025.

title: Uber Green EV Initiative
summary_short: Uber's transition to 100% electric vehicles in US/EU by 2030.
intro_short: Uber is investing $800M to help drivers switch to EVs through partnerships with automakers and charging networks. Features include in-app EV trip filtering, charging station locators, and premium pricing for green rides.
impact: Already eliminated 250,000 tons of CO2 in 2023. Projected to remove 5 million gas vehicles from Uber platforms by 2030.

title: Vehicle-to-Grid Charging Hubs
summary_short: Smart charging stations that enable electric cabs to power the grid during peak hours.
intro_short: Innovative charging infrastructure allowing EV taxis to sell stored energy back to utilities during high-demand periods. Uses bidirectional charging technology and AI-powered scheduling.
impact: Each vehicle can earn $1,200/year in energy credits while reducing grid strain. Pilot in London shows 23% reduction in peak electricity demand from taxi fleets.

title: Modular EV Battery Swapping
summary_short: 90-second battery replacement system for continuous cab operation.
intro_short: Robotic battery swap stations eliminate charging downtime for commercial EVs. Taxis receive fully charged packs in under 2 minutes while AI optimizes battery health tracking.
impact: Increases taxi utilization by 40% and extends battery lifespan by 30%. Currently deployed in 1,200 locations across China and Norway.
